data.text: @RoyalCaribbean Thank you! Newest update looks like this storm is slowing down even more, making landfall later than planned. Will royal Caribbean revert back to the original intinerary if that’s the case? Or is our new update the final answer?

tweets.text: @mcowart_15 Hi, Megan. Sorry for the trouble with this. The itinerary will remain the same for the days left on the voyage. Visit us here for the list of changes: https://t.co/RAWu9izEEn. -Zack
